attributes.additional_details: This past year has seen the most sightings and more and more people are becoming aware of their presence, there are genuine videos online and many leading scientists and ufologists have tried and pushed for a full disclosure but their voices go unnoticed! Its time to tell the truth.
attributes.background: The uk government need to tell the truth to the people about UFO's!, too many cover ups and and sightings go unnoticed by the media and it's time to realize that they are here!
